properties.address: Adult Learning Centre, Burden Rd, Beverley, East Yorkshire HU17 9LW
properties.description: We're an Adult only space. We're open as a welcoming space once a week bringing a morning of coffee, tea, biscuits and the opportunity to socialise with other like-minded people. We're also offering an afternoon of activities you're welcome to stay for too.
properties.title: Beverley Adult Learning Centre

properties.description: On Mondays, we have a Warm Welcome Space in our Main Hall. The additional times, our Cafe is open which offers a Pay It Forward option to provide funded meals.
